# Pull Request

## Description

Provide a brief description of the changes in this PR.

## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test coverage improvement
- [ ] Build/CI/CD improvement

## Related Issues

Fixes #(issue number)
Closes #(issue number)
Related to #(issue number)

## Changes Made

Describe the changes in detail:

- Change 1
- Change 2
- Change 3

## Motivation and Context

Why is this change required? What problem does it solve?

## Screenshots (if applicable)

Add screenshots to help explain your changes.

## How Has This Been Tested?

Describe the tests you ran to verify your changes:

- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] Manual testing

**Test Configuration**:
- .NET SDK Version:
- Database:
- OS:

## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the coding standards of this project (see CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have added XML documentation comments for public APIs
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have followed the CQRS pattern and project architecture

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] I have added unit tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] All tests pass: `dotnet test`
- [ ] Build succeeds: `dotnet build`

## Documentation Checklist

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the CLAUDE.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated XML documentation comments
- [ ] I have updated CONTRIBUTING.md (if architectural changes were made)

## Database Changes

- [ ] No database changes
- [ ] Migration added: `dotnet ef migrations add MigrationName`
- [ ] Migration tested locally
- [ ] Database schema documentation updated (if applicable)

## Dependencies

- [ ] No new dependencies added
- [ ] New dependencies added (list them below with justification)

**New Dependencies** (if any):
- Package name - Version - Reason for adding

## Breaking Changes

- [ ] No breaking changes
- [ ] Contains breaking changes (describe below)

**Breaking Changes Description** (if any):

## Deployment Notes

Any special deployment considerations or migration steps:

## Additional Notes

Any additional information that reviewers should know:

## Reviewer Checklist (for maintainers)

- [ ] Code quality meets project standards
- [ ] Tests are adequate and pass
- [ ] Documentation is updated
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Performance impact is acceptable
- [ ] Breaking changes are justified and documented
